Config Management Camp

5 - 7 February, 2018

Gent, Belgium

Managing server secrets at scale with SaltStack and a vaultless password manager

Ignat Korchagin

Ever wondered how to quickly and efficiently roll over all of your 1000 serversâ€™ SSH keys? How to securely manage diskless systems and horizontally / vertically scale their credentials? This talk will introduce a simple approach that combines some hardware support, a little cryptography and SaltStack to help operationalise the management of all the secrets in your cloud

About the Speaker

Ignat Korchagin, Cloudflare platform operations
